# Load Data

```{r data}
# data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/x-atlas-consortia/hra-pop/main/output-data/v0.8.3/reports/atlas/validation-v5.csv",
#                  header=T)
data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/x-atlas-consortia/hra-pop/main/output-data/v0.10.2/reports/atlas/validation-v6.csv", 
                 header=T, fileEncoding = "UTF8")
```

# Prepare Data

```{r data prep}
# Clean up organ label strings
data$organ <- data$organ %>%
  str_replace("left ", "") %>%
  str_replace("right ", "") %>%
  str_replace("Set of ", "") %>%
  str_replace("left ", "") %>%
  str_replace(" of body", "") %>% 
  str_replace("respiratory system","lung") %>%
  str_replace("male reproductive system","prostate") %>%
  str_to_title()

# Clean up anatomical structure strings
data$as <- data$as %>%
  str_replace(" of urinary bladder", "") %>%
  str_replace(" of prostate", "") %>%
  str_replace(" of kidney", "") %>%
  str_replace(" of liver", "") %>%
  str_replace(" of heart", "") %>%
  str_replace("heart ", "") %>%
  str_replace(" of spleen", "") %>%
  str_replace(" of body", "") %>%
  str_trim() %>%
  str_to_title() %>%
  str_replace("Of", "of")

# Remove spatial data
data <- data[data$modality!="sc_proteomics",]

# Combine cell_id and cell_label
data$cell_name <- paste0(data$cell_id,"-",data$cell_label)
```

# Heatmaps Analysis

## All Tools

```{r heatmap_all_tools_v0.2, fig.height=12, fig.width=48}
# Create pivot
data_hm <- data[,c(4,6,7,11,12)] %>% 
              pivot_wider(names_from = cell_name,
                          values_from = percentage,
                          values_fill = 0,
                          values_fn = mean) %>%
            arrange(organ, as_id)

# Convert DF to a matrix
data_hmp <- data.matrix(data_hm[,2:ncol(data_hm)])

# Assign Row.names as organs
rownames(data_hmp) <- paste0(data_hm$organ,"-",data_hm$as)
data_hmp <- data_hmp[order(row.names(data_hmp)),]

# Scale data
data_hmp <- scale(data_hmp)

# Generate heatmap
pheatmap::pheatmap(data_hmp)
```

## Azimuth

```{r heatmap_azimuth_v0.2, fig.height=12, fig.width=24}
# Create pivot
data_ha <- data %>% 
              filter(tool == "azimuth") %>%
              select(organ, as, cell_name, percentage) %>%
              pivot_wider(names_from = cell_name,
                          values_from = percentage,
                          values_fill = 0,
                          values_fn = mean)

# Convert DF to a matrix

# Assign Row.names as organs

```
